octeon_hw.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Host Driver: PCI read/write routines and default register values.

static uint64_t OCTEON_PCI_WIN_READ ( octeon_device_t *  oct,
uint64_t  addr 
) [inline, static]

Read windowed register.

Parameters:
oct - pointer to the Octeon device.
addr - Address of the register to read.
This routine is called to read from the indirectly accessed Octeon registers that are visible through a PCI BAR0 mapped window register.
Returns:
- 64 bit value read from the register.

static void OCTEON_PCI_WIN_WRITE ( octeon_device_t *  oct,
uint64_t  addr,
uint64_t  val 
) [inline, static]

Write windowed register.

Parameters:
oct - pointer to the Octeon device.
addr - Address of the register to write
val - Value to write
This routine is called to write to the indirectly accessed Octeon registers that are visible through a PCI BAR0 mapped window register.
Returns:
Nothing.
